name: Vegan Mango Lassi
description: Vegan mango Lassi - Indian Mango Yogurt smoothie with ripe mango, non dairy yogurt and cardamom or saffron. Dairy-free, gluten-free.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup So Delicious Coconut Milk Yogurt  (or Almond Milk Yogurt or Home made Almond Cashew Yogurt from my book or soy yogurt)
1 cup Mango pulp (1/4 cup more for more mango-ey Lassi or equivalent cubed very ripe Mangoes)
1/4 cup almond milk  (or other non dairy milk)
1/4 cup chilled water or Ice cubes (less or more for desired Lassi consistency)
1 Tablespoon raw sugar or maple (less or more depending on the sweetness of the mango pulp.)
Variations: Add 1/4 tsp cardamom powder (or saffron strands or rose essence or vanilla.)

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all the ingredients through sugar. Taste and adjust sugar.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend all the ingredients through sugar. Taste and adjust sugar.

recipeInstructions.text: Add lemon juice and blend again. Serve chilled.
